pr_title: Fix issue #4213:  trim the last char of the URL if it is a closing parenthesis

timeline.body: Return `null` instead of an empty string, if you found nothing (also remember to add `@Nullable` to the function)
timeline.bodyText: Return null instead of an empty string, if you found nothing (also remember to add @Nullable to the function)
timeline.bodyHTML: Return null instead of an empty string, if you found nothing (also remember to add @Nullable to the function)
timeline.author: Stypox

commits_in_main.message: Consider protocol as base url when it is a custom one (e.g. vnd.youtube)
Update Invidious URL list in Link Handler Factory
keep invidious instances list in the same order
fix Invidious channels being accepted by YoutubeStreamLinkHandlerFactory (#527)
[YouTube] Support live URLs and do minor improvements to YoutubeStreamLinkHandlerFactory

timeline.bodyHTML:
We might consider removing isId() altogether and replacing

if (isId()) {
    return extractId()
}

with

final String extractedId = extractId(id);
if (extractedId != null) {
    return extractedId;
}

which does one regex comparison less, and is even clearer imo
timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.body: Move `Pattern.compile("([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11})")` to a `public static final` class field, to prevent compiling it every time.
timeline.bodyText: Move Pattern.compile("([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11})") to a public static final class field, to prevent compiling it every time.
timeline.bodyHTML: Move Pattern.compile("([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11})") to a public static final class field, to prevent compiling it every time.

timeline.body:
Merge this and the above line into
```java
final String possiblyId = extractId(schemeSpecificPart.substring(2));
```
